00007 ORFileReader::ORFileReader(std::string filename)
00008 {
00009   if (filename != "") AddFileToProcess(filename);
00010 }

00012 size_t ORFileReader::Read(char* buffer, size_t nBytesMax)
00013 {
00014   read(buffer, nBytesMax);
00015   size_t bytesLeft = nBytesMax - gcount();
00016   if(bytesLeft > 0) {
00017     Close();
00018     if(Open()) bytesLeft -= Read(buffer, bytesLeft);
00019   }
00020   return nBytesMax-bytesLeft;
00021 }
00022 
00023 bool ORFileReader::OpenDataStream()
00024 {
00025   if(fFileList.size() > 0) {
00026     ORLog(kDebug) << "OpenDataStream(): opening file " << fFileList[0] << std::endl;
00027     open(fFileList[0].c_str());
00028     if(!OKToRead()) {
00029       ORLog(kError) << "Could not open file " << fFileList[0] << std::endl;
00030       return false;
00031     }
00032     fFileList.erase(fFileList.begin());
00033     return true;
00034   }
00035   else {
00036     ORLog(kDebug) << "OpenDataStream(): no more files to open. " << std::endl;
00037     return false;
00038   }
00039 }
